
IMPORTANT - THIS CODE HAS BEEN OBTAINED FROM ATOS ORIGIN - WEBTIS PROJECT



To create a precompiled version of the redirector, the following should be execurted in a command prompt 
(updating the folder paths for the location of the files, and the target)


C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727\aspnet_compiler.exe -f -p C:\Redirector\Redirector -v / C:\Redirector\RedirectorPreCompiled
